mapper.sql: pk, business_number, received, sum_received, received_type, received_time, card_account, related_pk, supplier_pk, voucher_file, status, comment, confirm_time, confirm_user, create_user, update_user, collecter, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: select A.pk, A.business_number, A.received, A.sum_received, A.received_type, A.received_time, A.card_account, A.related_pk, A.supplier_pk, A.voucher_file, A.status, A.comment, A.confirm_time, A.confirm_user, C.user_name AS apply_user, D.user_name AS confirm_user_name, A.create_user, A.update_user, A.collecter, A.create_time, A.update_time, B.supplier_short_name AS supplier_name from air_received_detail A LEFT JOIN supplier B ON A.supplier_pk = B.pk LEFT JOIN user_base C ON A.create_user = C.user_number LEFT JOIN user_base D ON A.confirm_user = D.user_number where A.related_pk = #{related_pk,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into air_received_detail
pk,
business_number,
received,
sum_received,
received_type,
received_time,
card_account,
related_pk,
supplier_pk,
voucher_file,
status,
comment,
confirm_time,
confirm_user,
create_user,
update_user,
collecter,
create_time,
update_time,

mapper.update:
update air_received_detail
pk = #{pk,jdbcType=CHAR},
business_number = #{business_number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
received = #{received,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
sum_received = #{sum_received,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
received_type = #{received_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
received_time = #{received_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
card_account = #{card_account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
related_pk = #{related_pk,jdbcType=CHAR},
supplier_pk = #{supplier_pk,jdbcType=CHAR},
voucher_file = #{voucher_file,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
confirm_time = #{confirm_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
confirm_user = #{confirm_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_user = #{create_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_user = #{update_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
collecter = #{collecter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{update_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where pk = #{pk,jdbcType=CHAR}
